meanings.definition: Measures taken to prevent the spread of disease in a population.
meanings.sent1: The farm implemented strict biosecurity protocols to keep the animals healthy.
meanings.sent2: The hospital had high biosecurity standards to protect patients from infections.
meanings.sent3: The biosecurity measures at the zoo were so thorough that even the monkeys wore tiny masks.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against viruses, biosecurity acts as a shield for the community.
meanings.sent5: The importance of biosecurity became clear when the outbreak was contained within days.

meanings.definition: The practice of protecting against biological threats.
meanings.sent1: Government agencies work together to ensure national biosecurity against potential dangers.
meanings.sent2: Research labs have strict biosecurity measures in place to prevent accidental releases.
meanings.sent3: The biosecurity team's motto was 'Stay safe, stay protected, stay biosecure!'
meanings.sent4: In the world of bioterrorism, biosecurity is the first line of defense.
meanings.sent5: The concept of biosecurity is like a shield that guards us from unseen dangers.
